struct.name: hdr
struct.comment: All SWF files begin with this header

data.name: Signature
data.comment: Magic characters that identify a .SWF file.

data.name: FileLength
data.comment: Length of entire file in bytes

data.name: NBits_5
data.comment: High five bites is number of bits of each of next 4 fields (Xmin, Xmax, Ymin, Ymax)

data.name: REST
data.comment: This and lower 3 bits of previous byte encodes the 4 coords of the RECT

data.name: FrameCount
data.comment: Total number of frames in movie

data.name: Code
data.comment: Top 10 bits is the tag for the record type. Bottom 6 bits is the tag length. If bottom 6 bits is 63 (all bits on) then the real length is in following DWORD.

data.name: TagData_short
data.comment: The data for the short tag

struct.name: LongTag
struct.comment: Length of long tag folllowed by the data

data.name: Length
data.comment: Length of long tag if short tag length is $3F
